Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its value and the benefits it provides, we're offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. We believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value of the product and your budget. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
